in this video I make a bit of a "gourmet" breakfast hot chocolate which is infused with vanilla and cinnamon . both of those spices bring a delicate flavour that goes really well with chocolate.i am saying gourmet but perhaps i should say contemporary instead, because the modern way of doing this would be for many french people to use of the shelf powder chocolate mix like banania with milk added to it to get a hot chocolate done. so yes it‚Äôs not like every home is making the effort of making that recipe from scratch but it is the real hot chocolate recipe .


note: if you want a more liquid hot chocolate for easy drinking just add some more milk. in its more liquid form (with lots of milk) you can also drink that chocolate cold
